text: @kimguilfoyle @JoeBiden You aren't a Mom, got covid-19 because you refused to wear a mask & will say anything to make yourself relevant to Trump. Your ignorance was on display at Mt. Rushmore. How many others have you infected? How many Trump fans have gotten covid while in WH? Ignorance becomes you!
